name: Westgate
description: Lots of open seating and cafes; good natural light.

name: VivoCity
description: Large food courts and scattered benches; lively on weekends.

name: Jurong Regional Library
description: Quiet study areas with lots of power outlets.

name: Coffee Bean @ Downtown
description: Friendly staff and stable Wi-Fi.

name: NEX Shopping Centre
description: Popular mall with lots of casual seating and cafes.

name: National Library Board
description: Modern library with excellent study facilities and Wi-Fi.

name: Starbucks Marina Bay
description: Scenic waterfront view with ample electrical outlets.

name: Tampines 1 Mall
description: Spacious mall with food court and comfortable seating.

name: Tanjong Pagar Public Library
description: Cozy reading nooks and study desks. Bring headphones for ambient music.

name: The Clementi Mall
description: Modern mall with comfortable lounge areas and charging hubs.

name: Tiong Bahru Bakery & Co
description: Artisanal bakery with vintage vibes. Great for casual study groups.

name: Library @ Orchard Central
description: Well-lit study spaces with individual desks and quiet zones.

name: The Central @ Clarke Quay
description: Vibrant mall with dining options and bustling atmosphere for group study.

name: Compass Point Shopping Centre
description: Quiet corners at the rooftop garden and indoor seating areas.

name: Forest Hill Cafe
description: Hidden gem with plants, natural light, and zero distractions.

name: East Coast Mall – Top Floor Lounge
description: Serene lounge area overlooking the beach. Perfect for focused work.

name: Hougang Public Library
description: Community library with study carrels and group discussion rooms.

name: Coffee Bean @ East Coast Park
description: Outdoor seating with park views. Bring a cushion for comfort.

name: Kallang Library
description: Large study areas with modern amenities and quiet reading zones.

name: Marina Square – Upper Floors
description: Quieter upper floors with scattered seating areas.
